title: Luigi Lusi
text:
Luigi Lusi (<a href="Rome">Rome</a>, 25 November 1961) is an Italian <a href="politician">politician</a>, <a href="criminal%20defense%20lawyer">lawyer</a> and <a href="Italian%20Senate">Senator</a>. He was the <a href="treasurer">treasurer</a> of <a href="Democracy%20Is%20Freedom%20%E2%80%93%20The%20Daisy">The Daisy</a> from 2001 to 2007 and a member of the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28Italy%29">Democratic Party</a> from 2007 to 2012.
Indictment.
On 31 January 2012 Lusi was indicted for allegedly taking the sum of €13 million owned by his former party, <a href="Democracy%20Is%20Freedom%20%E2%80%93%20The%20Daisy">The Daisy</a>, and using it for personal purposes. On 6 February 2012 he was expelled from the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28Italy%29">Democratic Party</a> for being "incompatible with the core principles of the Party".
